description: You are an assistant that maps natural language requests to a specific creation task. Only required if next_step is 'parseCreationParts'.

creation_task.description: The specific creation task the user wants to perform, such as 'create an image', 'create an entity', 'update an entity', etc.

invalid_creation_request.description: Indicates whether the user's request is not related to any creation task. Set to true if the request does not involve creating or updating any content.
